channel.title: tonejs on Educational material for LSU Programming Digital Media
channel.description: Recent content in tonejs on Educational material for LSU Programming Digital Media

item.title: Including Tone
item.description: For Tone.js to work in your sketch you need to include it in your HTML file. Open your project-folder and find the index.html file. Add this line under the first three script tags: <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/tone/0.11.0/Tone.min.js"></script> This loads Tone.js in your sketch.
